title: Kench's Devour is toxic for allied players
body:
This is not the 1st time it happened to me where I was matched with toxic Tahm Kench. The game, which is ranked game, was not going well and he used Devour on me and probably on allies after which he threw me/allies into the enemies. 

Its nice in normal games between friends but when we play competetive game and things are not going well this get worst and helps enemies win the game

Ever since this champ came out i knew this was going to happen - an ability that can be used on allies for negative purpose. Something about Kench's Devourer should be done otherwise people would still continue to use Devourer for negative purpose

For instance I should be able to have much greater control when Ally Kench use Devourer on me. Like lets say I can exit Devour after 0.5 seconds in my desired direction where he wont be able to do it for 2 seconds


here's the problem
>After 1 second, Devour can be recast into Regurgitate Regurgitate while Tahm Kench's belly is full. 
>Allied champions can exit at will **AFTER THE SAME DELAY.**

Because Kench cant do the same? Get real, bro

? There is a small window where the person who has been aten can click to jump out right before kench is able to.



Also spamming right click on kench is just a movement command by default , "get real, bro"
Not as toxic as a troll Anivia wall.
Or Trundle pillar when youÂ´re ulting or E'ing someone as Urgot.

The issue is, sometimes you can't tell if he's trolling or he wanted to engage (unless you have really low hp, then it's obvious) because, when he's carrying an ally, he gets increased movement speed.

Of course, if he's actually trolling, he might just go all out and build full Movement Speed, dump all his wards into one bush at the same time or not ward at all, and recklessly steal farm so this is less of a problem than it seems.
Because you can't troll the jungler with Alistar or wall off your allies with Trundle or Anivia or use blitz hook to pull fighters to your squishies or intentionally feed with every champion.
Only when you've got a troll. And if he's going to troll on Tahm, he was going to troll no matter what champion he got.
It's the problem with abilities that have those capabilities - the stronger it can be, the easier it is to troll with it.

Riot clarified (when bard was released) that they are not going to babysit players and kits to prevent trolling.

The same troll could just run down lane, tell the other team where everyone is, steal buffs..
